paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses the prevalence of wild type transthyretin amyloidosis (ATTRwt) in a heart failure clinic, mentioning one specific variant in the TTR gene (V30M) and providing some penetrance data.

individual_records.phenotype_details: carried the V30M mutation endemic to northern Sweden
individual_records.evidence_sentence: All patients with DPD uptake underwent sequencing of the TTR gene and one patient was found to carry the V30M mutation endemic to northern Sweden.

functional_data.summary: The V30M variant is associated with hereditary ATTR cardiomyopathy.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in families affected by hereditary ATTR.
variants.additional_notes: The paper primarily focuses on ATTRwt but mentions this variant in the context of hereditary ATTR.
key_quotes: All patients with DPD uptake underwent sequencing of the TTR gene and one patient was found to carry the V30M mutation endemic to northern Sweden.

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward as the paper provided clear information regarding the TTR variant.
